about_the_game:
Become a void-slaying overlord in Tiny Squads, an auto-battler where your units can be customised and merged, allowing you to design the ultimate team in your vision.

Draft Your Perfect Team

Each round gives access to a variety of different units and synergies, offering strong bonuses the more they are used. Customise your units further with powerful skills and randomly-generated equipment to take them to the next level.

Build Units From Scratch

In contrast to most auto battlers, units in Tiny Squads do not have fully predefined traits. Each unit only has a class, but comes with numerous empty slots for you to experiment with and discover synergies on your own.

Different Choices Each Time

Randomised shops and enemies will force you to change your strategy each time you play. This, together with the customisation, enable a large number of outcomes for each match.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Anything capable of producing sound.

short_description: Draft a squad of tiny heroes and slay monsters of the Void in this auto-battler rogue-like. Design your own units with an assortment of classes, equipment, skills and unique effects! Merge units to create a monstrous tiny titan!
